content: Good piece. One thing though — I wouldn’t call their young core “solid.” Mirotic and McDermott are enigmas who are wildly inconsistent, Portis has been awful this year, and Valentine has been too injured to tell. I’m also guessing they were a lot higher on Felicio last year given how little he’s shown this year. After drafting brilliantly in the first part of their tenure, GarPax have greatly disappointed in recent years.
